/* orderListMapper.selectOrderListCount */ SELECT COUNT(odNo) FROM (SELECT O.OD_NO AS odNo ,O.OD_STATE AS odState ,O.OD_DATE AS odDate ,T.TR_DATE AS trDate ,C.CS_ID AS csId ,C.CS_NM AS csNm FROM ORDER_INFO O LEFT OUTER JOIN TRANSFER_INFO T ON T.OD_NO = O.OD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER_INFO C ON C.CS_NO = O.CS_NO WHERE 1=1
AND O.OD_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDt}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDt})+ 1
AND T.TR_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDt}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDt})+ 1
AND O.OD_STATE IN ('100','200','300','400')
AND O.OD_STATE = #{selectOptValOne}
AND( O.OD_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' OR C.CS_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' OR C.CS_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
AND(O.OD_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
AND(C.CS_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
AND(C.CS_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
GROUP BY O.OD_NO, O.OD_STATE, O.OD_DATE, T.TR_DATE, C.CS_ID, C.CS_NM)
